s2.name: JORAM source and binary packages
s2.p: The JORAM source and binary packages are available from the ObjectWeb Forge file repository page.

ul.li: kjoram-4.0.0.tgz, including kJORAM client libraries and kJORAM sample sources;
kjoram-4.0.0-src.tgz, including kJORAM client sources and kJORAM sample sources.

s2.p:
The license agreement is displayed before the download can start.
Click here to start the download process.

Note: all the packages are available as .tgz files. To unzip these files, just go where you want to install JORAM, and unzip it. You can use gunzip and tar tools on unix-like systems, or winzip utility on Windows. After having installed the JORAM product, please see the
Installation Guide.

s2.name: JORAM CVS code base
s2.p: For getting the latest stable JORAM version, or for getting the current development release, you have to use CVS.
JORAM and kJORAM are available by checking out the joram module.
The latest stable release tag is JORAM_4_0_2. For getting the current development release (potentially unstable), check out joram with no tag.
